definition: to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)

sentences.english: It has the biggest gap on the audience's satisfaction with comfort of spaces.
sentences.chinese: 观赏者对各设施空间舒适与气氛满意度之差异性较大。

sentences.english: At 10.30 pm we'll depart for our first night of aurora viewing.
sentences.chinese: 晚上10点半出发，开始第1个极光观赏之夜。

sentences.english: Millions of people every year view classic works of art in museums all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 每年，全世界数百万人在博物馆观赏古典艺术作品。

sentences.english: For the viewer to fall, to swim natural pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 给观赏者以高山流水，归游自然的欣悦。

sentences.english: D- Never, I did not visit any ball game last year.
sentences.chinese: 我过去一年没有到球场观赏比赛。

sentences.english: Every winter many tourists came here to view, and admire the snow covered view of the north Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天都会有很多游客来这里观赏塞北的雪景。

sentences.english: At noon, you’ll watch the changing of the guard.
sentences.chinese: 中午可以观赏到卫兵换岗的仪式。

sentences.english: Hamilton euonymus is a good ornamental species.
sentences.chinese: 桃叶卫矛是优良的观赏树种。

sentences.english: The gesneriaceae are very popular landscape plants around the world recently.
sentences.chinese: 苦苣苔科植物是近年来国际上十分流行的观赏花卉。

sentences.english: It does slow you down but I was able to really see each flower.
sentences.chinese: 确实慢下脚步来，而我能够真切地观赏到每一朵花。

sentences.english: This aquarium tank from the ice structure, ornamental fish frozen in the inside.
sentences.chinese: 这种水族缸由冰块构成，观赏鱼被冷冻在了里面。

sentences.english: Camellia terminalis, a new ornamental plant from Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 项生金花茶，广西一新的观赏植物。

sentences.english: You can zoom in now and get a pretty nice view of the Dome.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以随意放大来好好观赏一下佐治亚穹顶的风光。

sentences.english: They take visitors to see the most beautiful rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 他们带游客去观赏最美丽的彩虹。

sentences.english: Passes to spectator stand and beer coupons are offered to bona-fide visitors only.
sentences.chinese: 观赏区入场券及啤酒畅饮券只供访港旅客使用。

sentences.english: There are a variety of fancy fishes, pet cats and pet dogs.
sentences.chinese: 专门卖各种观赏鱼，和小猫小狗等宠物。

definition: to view/to look at/to look sth over
to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to appreciate/to take pleasure in/to enjoy
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
to look intensively/to feast one's eyes on
